meanings.definition: The way in which one acts or conducts oneself
meanings.sent1: Sarah's behaviour during the presentation was confident and engaging.
meanings.sent2: The dog's behaviour at the park was playful and energetic.
meanings.sent3: The behaviour of the robot vacuum cleaner amused the whole family.
meanings.sent4: The behaviour of the clouds shifting across the sky was like a dance.
meanings.sent5: His behaviour during the interview was so professional that he got the job on the spot.

meanings.definition: The actions or reactions of a person or animal in response to external or internal stimuli
meanings.sent1: The child's behaviour changed when he saw the scary movie.
meanings.sent2: The cat's behaviour towards the new toy was curious and cautious.
meanings.sent3: The behaviour of the alarm clock waking him up was comical.
meanings.sent4: The behaviour of the market in response to the news was unpredictable.
meanings.sent5: The dog's behaviour during the thunderstorm was anxious and scared.
